channel.title: Byrne Electric Motors Ltd latest news
channel.description: Byrne Electric Motors Ltd latest news and updates

item.title: Season's Greetings and Charitable Giving
item.description: This year, we are proud to donate to The Simon Community, The Irish Cancer Society, and Barretstown House, thanks to our amazing customers.

item.title: Racing Towards the Christmas Holidays with New Deliveries!
item.description: Byrne Electric Motors received over 20 pallets of electric motors, fans, and pumps this morning, ensuring smooth operations for the Christmas rush!

item.title: Busy Days at Byrne Electric Motors
item.description: We've been hard at work repairing fan coil motors at Byrne Electric Motors, ensuring they're ready to keep office blocks comfortable year-round.

item.title: A Christmas Present for Byrne Electric Motors: New Premises Purchased!
item.description: Byrne Electric Motors expands its capacity with a new premises, increasing total space to over 6000 square feet, paving the way for growth into 2025 and beyond.

item.title: Grundfos Bus Stop at Byrne Electric Motors
item.description: Two Grundfos Hydro MPC pump sets are leaving Byrne Electric Motors this week, one for a large data centre and another for one of Irelandâ€™s largest hotel chains.

item.title: Exciting Shipments on the Move!
item.description: 12 AmTecs Ltd motors with Motovario geared units and 4 SEW Eurodrive units are heading to Ireland for agricultural and fisheries applications.

item.title: Emergency Breakdown? Not a Problem with Byrne Electric Motors
item.description: Byrne Electric Motors provides quick solutions for emergency breakdowns with a wide range of condenser fans in stock, ready to assist Dublin Airport with Ziehl Abegg condenser fans.

item.title: Beyond the 9 to 5: Our Commitment to Your Production
item.description: Discover how Byrne Electric Motors goes beyond the typical 9 to 5 to ensure your production never stops.

item.title: Good Morning from Byrne Electric Motors!
item.description: Byrne Electric Motors delivers two GRUNDFOS Hydro Multi pump sets to Grafton Street, Dublin, all before 8am, showcasing our commitment to exceptional service.

item.title: Sunday Service: AmTecs 1.5 kW Motor On The Move
item.description: Our AmTecs Ltd 1.5 kW motor heads out on a Sunday, marking our 3rd emergency breakdown service this weekend, highlighting our dedication to customer satisfaction.

item.title: Another Retrofit Fan Being Sent to Site!
item.description: Discover how our new Comefri Group plug fan, supplied by Byrne Electric Motors, enhances energy efficiency and reduces maintenance in AHUs.

item.title: End of Summer Update from Byrne Electric Motors
item.description: As summer ends, Byrne Electric Motors reflects on a mixed season with great sales, featuring 60 AmTecs Ltd motors prepared for an OEM customer and insights on our multi-mount motor capabilities.

item.title: Feel the Friday Vibes with Byrne Electric Motors!
item.description: Celebrate the August bank holiday and the dispatch of six Grundfos Hydro Multi E pumps with Byrne Electric Motors.

item.title: When We Say We Do Motors, We Mean We Do Motors!
item.description: Discover our latest achievement: delivering a 6500kg motor with modified specs in just 3 weeks!

item.title: Feel the Change in Weather with Byrne Electric Motors
item.description: Discover how Byrne Electric Motors anticipates weather changes with Ziehl Abegg and EBM Papst fans.
